FilterItemPortable.Name: Aprovados
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>2</Value> <Text>Aprovado</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">(A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>(A.STATUS IN ('2')) AND (A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Aprovar
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">( (A.STATUS = 1 AND A.LIBERADO = 'S') AND ( (A.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN(SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B,CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ((C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S')) OR (A.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN (SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I, CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ((G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE = 'S')) ) ) AND (A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>( (A.STATUS = 1 AND A.LIBERADO = 'S') AND ( (A.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN(SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B,CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ((C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S')) OR (A.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN (SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I, CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ((G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE = 'S')) ) ) AND (A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Cancelado
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>4</Value> <Text>Cancelado</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">(A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>(A.STATUS IN ('4')) AND (A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Em aprovação
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>1</Value> <Text>Em elaboração</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="LIBERADO"> <FieldDefinitionName>BooleanFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="3"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">(A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>(A.STATUS IN ('1')) AND A.LIBERADO = :2__LIBERADO AND (A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Where> <Parameters> <Parameter> <Name>2__LIBERADO</Name> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">S</Value> <Direction>Input</Direction> <DataType>String</DataType> <Precision>0</Precision> <Scale>0</Scale> <Size>0</Size> </Parameter> </Parameters> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Em elaboração
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>1</Value> <Text>Em elaboração</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="LIBERADO"> <FieldDefinitionName>BooleanFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="3"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">(A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>(A.STATUS IN ('1')) AND A.LIBERADO = :2__LIBERADO AND (A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Where> <Parameters> <Parameter> <Name>2__LIBERADO</Name> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">N</Value> <Direction>Input</Direction> <DataType>String</DataType> <Precision>0</Precision> <Scale>0</Scale> <Size>0</Size> </Parameter> </Parameters> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Encerrado
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>3</Value> <Text>Encerrado</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">(A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>(A.STATUS IN ('3')) AND (A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Recusado
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>6</Value> <Text>Recusado</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">(A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>(A.STATUS IN ('6')) AND (A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Suspenso
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>5</Value> <Text>Suspenso</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">(A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>(A.STATUS IN ('5')) AND (A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Vencido
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>diferente</Name> <DatabaseOperator><></DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>3</Value> <Text>Encerrado</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>diferente</Name> <DatabaseOperator><></DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>4</Value> <Text>Cancelado</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="3"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">(A.DATAFIM < @NOW) AND (A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>(A.STATUS NOT IN ('3')) AND (A.STATUS NOT IN ('4')) AND (A.DATAFIM < @NOW) AND (A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 3 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'S' ))</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>
